name: Aslsh
desc_en: Aslsh is a lightweight shell implemented in Go, made for educational purposes to help me understand basic shell functionality and system command execution.
desc_cat: Aslsh is a lightweight shell implemented in Go, made for educational purposes to help me understand basic shell functionality and system command execution.
desc_esp: Aslsh is a lightweight shell implemented in Go, made for educational purposes to help me understand basic shell functionality and system command execution.

name: CommanderMTG_AndroidApp
desc_en: This Android application helps track life totals and match statistics for Magic: The Gathering Commander games, including support for managing commanders, matches (partidas), and user-commander relationships.
desc_cat: This Android application helps track life totals and match statistics for Magic: The Gathering Commander games, including support for managing commanders, matches (partidas), and user-commander relationships.
desc_esp: This Android application helps track life totals and match statistics for Magic: The Gathering Commander games, including support for managing commanders, matches (partidas), and user-commander relationships.

name: CommanderMTG_API
desc_en: This service provides CRUD operations for managing Magic: The Gathering Commander games, including commanders, matches (partidas), and user-commander relationships.
desc_cat: Aquest servei ofereix operacions CRUD per gestionar els jocs de Magic: The Gathering Commander, inclosos comandants, partits (partides) i relacions usuari-comandant.
desc_esp: Este servicio proporciona operaciones CRUD para administrar juegos de Magic: The Gathering Commander, incluidos comandantes, partidas y relaciones usuario-comandante.

name: CommanderMTG_Gateway
desc_en: The API Gateway routes requests to either the User Login service for authentication or the CRUD service for managing user data in the database.
desc_cat: The API Gateway routes requests to either the User Login service for authentication or the CRUD service for managing user data in the database.
desc_esp: The API Gateway routes requests to either the User Login service for authentication or the CRUD service for managing user data in the database.

name: CommanderMTG_Login
desc_en: This API provides endpoints for user login, registration, and complete CRUD functionality for managing user profiles in the database.
desc_cat: This API provides endpoints for user login, registration, and complete CRUD functionality for managing user profiles in the database.
desc_esp: This API provides endpoints for user login, registration, and complete CRUD functionality for managing user profiles in the database.

name: Documentacio
desc_en: Benvingut/da a les documentacions personals de Snr1s3. Aquí trobaràs guies i manuals per a la instal·lació i configuració de diferents serveis i eines.
desc_cat: Benvingut/da a les documentacions personals de Snr1s3. Aquí trobaràs guies i manuals per a la instal·lació i configuració de diferents serveis i eines.
desc_esp: Benvingut/da a les documentacions personals de Snr1s3. Aquí trobaràs guies i manuals per a la instal·lació i configuració de diferents serveis i eines.

name: PathOfRemembering
desc_en: Welcome, brave explorer, to the Path of Remembering! Though born as a final project for SMIX, this is no ordinary school assignment, it's a journey through a rich medieval fantasy world, where magic, mystery intertwine. o ready your blade, steady your mind, and prepare for liftoff—the Path of Remembering awaits...
desc_cat: Welcome, brave explorer, to the Path of Remembering! Though born as a final project for SMIX, this is no ordinary school assignment, it's a journey through a rich medieval fantasy world, where magic, mystery intertwine. o ready your blade, steady your mind, and prepare for liftoff—the Path of Remembering awaits...
desc_esp: Welcome, brave explorer, to the Path of Remembering! Though born as a final project for SMIX, this is no ordinary school assignment, it's a journey through a rich medieval fantasy world, where magic, mystery intertwine. o ready your blade, steady your mind, and prepare for liftoff—the Path of Remembering awaits...

name: PerformanceBot
desc_en: This bot provides real-time monitoring of system resources, including memory, CPU, and disk usage, along with live tracking of Docker container activity. It's designed to offer a clear and responsive overview of system performance for developers and system administrators.
desc_cat: Aquest bot proporciona un seguiment en temps real dels recursos del sistema, inclosa la memòria, la CPU i l'ús del disc, juntament amb un seguiment en directe de l'activitat del contenidor Docker. Està dissenyat per oferir una visió general clara i sensible del rendiment del sistema per als desenvolupadors i administradors del sistema.
desc_esp: Este bot proporciona monitoreo en tiempo real de los recursos del sistema, incluida la memoria, la CPU y el uso del disco, junto con un seguimiento en vivo de la actividad del contenedor Docker. Está diseñado para ofrecer una descripción general clara y receptiva del rendimiento del sistema para desarrolladores y administradores de sistemas.

name: Sorting-Algorithms
desc_en: This project provides implementations of various sorting algorithms across multiple programming languages, offering a comprehensive resource for learning, understanding, and comparing different sorting techniques.
desc_cat: This project provides implementations of various sorting algorithms across multiple programming languages, offering a comprehensive resource for learning, understanding, and comparing different sorting techniques.
desc_esp: This project provides implementations of various sorting algorithms across multiple programming languages, offering a comprehensive resource for learning, understanding, and comparing different sorting techniques.
